title: This server really can't support both Flex and Solo queue
body: Has anybody else noticed the random clusterfuck of rank disparity occurring in Flex? It's pretty obvious by now that this server is way too dead to properly support both queues.

replies.body:
I wouldn't say we're a "dead server" lol XD 
We're just too small to support 2 ranked queues.

But you're right the quality of Flex has been really low recently, the [Queue Health Updates](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-72-notes#patch-queue-health-update) have been showing that as well. Unfortunately if this keeps up much longer Riot said it would be removed and replaced with Ranked 5 Teams :(
